screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() # y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 120, textsize[1] + 120) offset = 90 wsizex = textsize[0] + 180 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (900 > wsizex): wsizex = 900 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex - 30, 90) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(15, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) # center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, (1080-wsizey)/2))
